main event: A bright, round light was observed moving rapidly in the sky over Mechanicsburg, Ohio on July 27, 1956.
interesting points: The object had an approximate diameter of 30-35 ft, It emitted brilliant white lights and left a white trail, The object was categorized as probably an aircraft and possibly a balloon, The witness observed the object moving from east to west at a slow speed, The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes and the object disappeared in the distance.
witness description: An individual who reported seeing the object from outside his home on a clear moonlit night.
